helpMarkDown: add Vault cli to path environment variable. Task icon taken from https://icons8.com/

inputs.name: connectedServiceName
inputs.label: Vault User
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select a previously registered service connection to talk to the Vault service. Choose 'Manage' to register a new service connection.

inputs.name: data
inputs.label: Data
inputs.helpMarkDown: Data Structure: {DataType(var | raw | base64)} => {Path} => {Field} => {TFSVar}.  use # sign for comment. var - insert value into secure TFS Vaiable, raw - save value as is into file and set TFS variable with file location, base64 - decode value as base64 and save into file & set TFS variable with file location
